channel.title: Comments on: Crisis Free Zone
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: I played poker. Also didn't kiss anyone, and perhaps my heart's a little hard to be broken. But I did have a good night, and I get the feeling it's going to be a damn good coming year....
item.content:encoded: I played poker. Also didn’t kiss anyone, and perhaps my heart’s a little hard to be broken. But I did have a good night, and I get the feeling it’s going to be a damn good coming year….
